title: TST CREW SHOW - To Exocet or to i8?
description:
Matt has been driving the BMW i8 Roadster and it's been "interesting". We talk about performance hybrids, the hamstringer i3, why Miatas should lose 1000lbs, and answer a lot of questions!

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/YhIIMLHwoZo

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
